GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Fetches an array of all articles with optional pagination, filtering by topic, and sorting.

200.description: Returns an array of articles with optional filters and pagination, and the total count of articles.

400.description: Bad request, possibly due to invalid query parameters (e.g., invalid `limit`, `p`, `sort_by`, etc.).

404.description: Topic not found, the provided topic does not exist.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves the article object for a specific article by id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a specific article with pagination

article_id.description: The ID of the article to fetch comments for

queries.name: limit
queries.description: Limits the number of comments returned. Defaults to 10 if not provided.

queries.name: p
queries.description: Specifies the page number. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

200.description: Returns an array of comments for the specified article, with pagination information.

400.description: Bad request, possibly due to invalid `page` or `limit` query.

404.description: Article not found for the provided `article_id`.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to a specific article

article_id.description: The ID of the article to post the comment to

username.description: The username of the user posting the comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the vote count for a specific article

article_id.description: The ID of the article to update

inc_votes.description: The number by which to increase or decrease the votes

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by its ID

comment_id.description: The ID of the comment to delete

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object by username

username.description: The username of the user to fetch

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Updates the votes of a comment based on the provided `inc_votes` value. The votes can be incremented, decremented, or left unchanged.

comment_id.description: The unique identifier of the comment whose votes are being updated

inc_votes.description: The number of votes to increment or decrement. Positive values increase the vote count, negative values decrease it, and zero leaves the vote count unchanged.

200.description: Returns the updated comment object with the new vote count.

400.description: Bad request, possibly due to invalid `inc_votes` value.

404.description: Comment not found for the provided `comment_id`.

article_img_url.description: The URL of an image related to the article. Defaults to a placeholder image if not provided.
